Package Bio :: Package PopGen

Package PopGen

source code


PopGen: Population Genetics and Genomics library in Python
Submodules [hide private]
  • Bio.PopGen.Async: Support for asynchronous execution.
    • Bio.PopGen.Async.Local: Asynchronous local execution.
  • Bio.PopGen.FDist: This module provides code to work with FDist.
    • Bio.PopGen.FDist.Async: Asynchronous execution of Fdist and spliting of loads.
    • Bio.PopGen.FDist.Controller: This module allows you to control fdist.
    • Bio.PopGen.FDist.Utils
  • Bio.PopGen.GenePop: This module provides code to work with GenePop.
    • Bio.PopGen.GenePop.Controller: This module allows to control GenePop.
    • Bio.PopGen.GenePop.EasyController: This module allows to control GenePop through an easier interface.
    • Bio.PopGen.GenePop.FileParser: This class provides code to parse BIG GenePop files.
    • Bio.PopGen.GenePop.LargeFileParser: Large file parsing of Genepop files
    • Bio.PopGen.GenePop.Utils
  • Bio.PopGen.SimCoal: SimCoal2 execution module and support functions.
    • Bio.PopGen.SimCoal.Async: (DEPRECATED) This module allows to cache Simcoal2 results, and return on the fly in case the calculation was done.
    • Bio.PopGen.SimCoal.Cache: (DEPRECATED) This module allows to cache Simcoal2 results, and return on the fly in case the calculation was done.
    • Bio.PopGen.SimCoal.Controller: This module allows you to control Simcoal2 and FastSimcoal
    • Bio.PopGen.SimCoal.Template
